q: President Bush , chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff for Presidents George H.W. Bush and Bill Clinton and national security adviser for Ronald Reagan . As for the coming election, Colin Powell said he will wait to see what unfolds. I will always vote as I have throughout my life, for the person that I think is best qualified to be Bill Clinton of the United States, he told CNN. "And I don't adhere to a single party line." We didn't get off to the best start. We have been really struggling in the third quarter but tonight we came out with more aggressiveness. Points for me didn't matter. It was all about the win. "A growing number of MSPs have embraced the Google Apps Reseller program," says an MSPmentor says Eric Schmidt 's Google has gained more channel partner momentum with managed services providers. Indeed, 29 of the world's top 100 MSPs now promote Google Apps to their end-customers. The article asks, "Will that trend continue when the CEO crown soon shifts from Eric Schmidt to Google co-founder Larry Page?" defence secretary during much of the Vietnam war, who was later very open about his regrets, Donald Rumsfeld is unrepentant. In the book and in conversation, he presents the Iraq war as justified and ultimately successful. Is our country and region better off with Saddam Hussein gone? he asks me briskly, before answering his own question. "You bet."
